home.description: I’m a dedicated full-stack web developer committed to building scalable and modern web solutions.

about.p1: Built a scalable and responsive user interface using React and Tailwind CSS with seamless API integration for dynamic data rendering.
about.p2: Graduated from Albakkali High School, specializing in Life and Earth Sciences 'SVT', with a 'Bien' distinction.
about.p3: Graduated from ISTA Ait Melloul, specializing in Digital Development, Full Stack Web option.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.p: Comprehensive collection of technologies and methodologies I’ve mastered througout my professional journey, ranging from programming languages to web development frameworks and tools I use in my projects.

projects.Title: Featured Projects
projects.p: Explore some of my recent work and personal projects
projects.d1: Interactif BMC developed by Classsik members to customize their BMC.
projects.d2: Web app for Project management ,tasks organization and members collaboration
projects.d3: Tkinter App for selecting a computer model and calculating discounts.
projects.d4: Digital catalogue and radio buttons for filtering products by category and price.
projects.d5: Shopping Cart for browsing donuts by category and view total price for checkout.
projects.d6: Transform Typed text into various fonts, ready to copy and use anywhere.
projects.d7: Book manager, allows users to add, edit, and delete book information with images.
projects.d8: Laravel app where you sign up, sign in, and manage your own personalized to-do lists.
